website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, affordable, and designed to withstand whatever nature throws your way, this coiled surf leash is an excellent long-term investment.
pros: Soft cuff won’t chafe or blister
Tight coil design won’t snag or tangle
cons: Some users may feel a little tension in the leash at first

customer_reviews.title: Not suggested for surfing a sup
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine leash for flat water paddling. The length is a little misleading if you stretch it to 10ft it will be pulling back hard on your leg. If you are a flat water paddler and stick to the middle of your board you will experience mild tension. Relaxed length is about 3ft. The leg cuff is only large enough for ankles. It will not work for calf or knee height attachment on an adult. Otherwise it looks well built, good stitching, solid swivels at both ends. I would not suggest it for surfing a sup, you wont be able to reach the nose and ankle attachement on a large board in surf can be problematic.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about how I like it yet.
customer_reviews.text: I misplaced my leash and needed a new one. Packaging and shipping were timely and efficient, however I’m not loving the least. Based on reviews I purchased this item. The leash is cooled well and the Velcro has a strong hold. I’m just not a fan of the 3” attachment between the Velcro strap and the cord. It is attached well, but is uncomfortable when wearing it. I haven’t used it on my board in case I return it. I’ll have to look at other reviews and see why this “contraption” is better than what I’m used to.
customer_reviews.author: Port Reviewer 13

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably and coil stretches easily
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made of good quality materials. Coil has a wire cable in center, covered is plastic/rubber. Ankle attachment is soft neoprene and hook/loop fastening, very comfortable and easily fits on my ankle with plenty of room for adjustment. I have an athletic build at 5'9" 200lbs. Some reviewers have mentioned that the cable is too tight while coiled. Mine barely offers any resistance, even when stretched out to 5-6 feet. In my opinion, this is a perfect safety attachment for use on a paddle board, as I'm intending it's use! Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Carver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two Ultralite 10' coiled leashes for two boards. They arrived in a timely manner and properly packaged. The products far surpassed our expectations. They're built with exceptional quality and should do the job. The company owners reached to me prior to the package arriving and were very conscientious in regards to customer care, that is a plus in my book. If you're looking to purchase a leash for your board, do not hesitate to purchase Surf and Snow Warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is easy to put on, and really comfortable. I use it with my stand up paddleboard. It has a generous amount of velcro, so it can be loose or tight around my ankle. It is simple to attach to the paddleboard. I have fallen off my paddleboard and this has stayed on. I don't even notice that I have it on. I bought a second stand up paddleboard for my sons and bought another one of these leashes.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Great communication and support for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are new owners of SUP boards and after paddles, leashes next thing to buy (super important!). I ordered two leashes and they came packaged well and an email from seller Surf & Snow Warehouse with directions how to properly attach leashes. Was very easy and last night when we fell several times in choppy water was so happy to have board come back to me! Great product, Great communication - Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hobson

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash! I was very excited to try this out on my paddleboard right away. I am so happy that I went with this leash over any other, it is very high quality and I feel like I can't lose my board while going down the river or swimming on the lake while it is leashed to my ankle! It swivles so I never get tangled in it while I'm maneuvering around on my board with my dog. It also looks awesome on my bright blue board!
customer_reviews.author: Keana Rayn

customer_reviews.title: Did the job so far in first season
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. It’s been on my paddle board for a couple months, so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: A good product, does exactly what it's supposed to do - keep paddleboard nearby. Delivery was quick as well. Good quality material and workmanship. Perhaps a quick disconnect at the cuff would be a nice addition, maybe something to think about for the next revision. All in all, I'm quite satisfied with this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my SUP and it's perfect. It is sturdy and well constructed. The ankle strap is comfortable and it is plenty long which I appreciate. I love the vivid pink color. Definitely pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My paddleboard came with a leash, but it felt too short. I like to be able to lie down flat on my board, but my other leash was too short for this. This is a great length for my 11ft board and my 5'8 stature.
customer_reviews.author: TeachShea

customer_reviews.title: Decent leash for Paddleboard
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this on my BOTE Aero HD Bugslinger Edition inflatable paddle board for about 8 months and the metal end is rusting. Other than that it works pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash. It's the perfect length (wont drag in the water) and most importantly: it's comfortable!! I don't notice wearing it at all when I'm on my iSUP. :) The quality is amazing - It was the first thing I noticed after I unpacked it. It's very durable and well made. I've had it for a week and I'm happy to report no issues so far. I also love the color (honestly, it is what made me buy it in the first place) and it looks great on my board.
customer_reviews.author: CjYarberry

customer_reviews.title: Good leash! Went for something with the lowest price ...
customer_reviews.text: Good leash! Went for something with the lowest price and this leash performs as good as any of the more expensive leashes. Would recommend this leash and like the coil instead of a straight leash.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Eva

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!! :)
customer_reviews.text: I love my new leash! The coil is a little bigger than how it looks in the photo (a plus)! The only thing is I wish it had a Velcro quick release. I love how comfortable the ankle strap is. It took a few minutes to get used to a coil leash after only ever using a straight leash. I welcome the change :) The seller was great with communication and was very prompt. Overall, this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Paddle Momma 22

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: For a piece of plastic and velcro this is well constructed. Communications from vendor were outstanding and I look forward to future dealings with them.
customer_reviews.author: !Da!2.0

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a couple times since I got it at the end of last season. It's comfortable and works as it should.

customer_reviews.title: was looking for a leash that tethers to my board withy velcro not cord

customer_reviews.author: CeeD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, fast delivery and excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my SUP foot coil, just so you know I ordered it on a Saturday and had it by Monday morning, technically less then 48 hours, was pleasantly surprised with such quick delivery. Package came nicely packed and the product was of a superb quality for the money. Will defiantly recommend to all my friends and family.

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1 Important Piece
customer_reviews.text: Overall, really nice product. Would be a 5 if it had the Velcro connect on both ends.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Is to short for me but is the best of the best Check size !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dudi Tayeb

customer_reviews.title: Great product /exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: this leash is awesome!! Perfect. I had ordered 2 and one was left out of the package (an amazon error) which These folks at Surf and Snow immediately helped me resolve!! Would write a longer review but gotta go, big waves calling my name!!!

customer_reviews.title: While they are perfect for protected
customer_reviews.text: Bought five of these for an outing of newbies on SUP for rental boards that did not provide them. So worth the peace of mind, even though everyone wore a pfd (have yet to hear of anyone missing who had both their pfd and leash attached). While they are perfect for protected, flat water paddling - I would recommend something a little more heavy duty if you are a serious paddler doing distance or planning on paddling in more challenging conditions. Everyone had a fun, safe time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Transaction, Leash just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Transaction, Leash just what I wanted. No more dragging my straight leash through the duck weed and pulling it up on my board. Quick ship rocked too! Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Good for paddleboarding
customer_reviews.text: I use the leash on my paddle board. Easy to put on and take off.

customer_reviews.text: I’ve got 3 of these leashes and will replace any other leash with one of these. Good quality and comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: It’s a leash, and it attaches to your board and your foot without bothering you. I had no issues with it rubbing or getting in the way.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and perfect for SUP

However, the material quality is excellent, seams are secure with no fraying, all connections are in working order, and it is comfortable!

customer_reviews.title: I feel so much better knowing that the board wont get away.

customer_reviews.title: Quality products with excellent service.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order from Surf and Snow Warehouse, and I will turn to them for all my surfing accessory needs. They have high quality, durable BPS products at a fair price with excellent customer service. I highly recommend them!

customer_reviews.title: I love this leash
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash. My other leash is straight, long and drags in the water. This leash rides on the board, does not drag in the water or get tangled in grass, logs or anything else in the water. And the price absurdly low.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, lightweight, comfy, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, the strap is super comfy as well, no irritating stitching resting on my ankle, and no resistance when you stretch the coil out, strongly recommend! Would buy again :)

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great value

product_meta.title: BPS ‘Storm’ Ultralite 10 Foot Coiled SUP Surf Leash/Leg Rope (4 Colors)
feature_bullets: The innovators at BPS are proud to present the BPS STORM ‘ULTRALITE’ leash – a light weight (but strong) leash specifically designed for Flat Water paddlers. You WILL forget it’s even on - but still have the great security a leash provides. Just undo the leash string, tie this onto your board’s leash attachment point – and you are ready to go.

It has an ankle fitting super comfortable padded Neoprene cuff, Double Stainless Steel swivels to stop tangles, and a light weight but strong 5.5mm Coiled Cord (which happily stretches out to 10 feet when required). The Coiling of the leash TOTALLY eliminates any leash drag (so no risk of snagging submerged objects) keeping your leash up on the back of your board and out of the water. The leash cuff also features a handy hidden key pocket.

Buy with complete confidence, as all our products are stored and shipped quickly and reliably to you. All BPS products come with a 'next-level guarantee' for 12 months. So if you encounter any quality issues at all, just let us know and it will be replaced or you'll be refunded -- your choice!

Thank you for looking at a product from our store, Surf and Snow Warehouse. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love -- water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100%. We are known for the great product support, advice and after-sales service we provide -- so if you have ANY questions about any of our products, please just ask.
